activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12149
activity.text:
@nihal467 I can work on this. Please assign it to me!

**Proposed Solution:**  
First, I will detect if there are any validation errors after form submission.  
Then, I will write a `scrollToTop` function that will automatically scroll to the first input field that has an error.  
After scrolling, I will also set the focus on that field to make it easier for the user to correct the error.

activity.text:
Hi, can you please assign this issue to me?

**Approach:**  
I will handle this by calling `setTooltipOpen(false)` after the route change. This will ensure that the tooltip is automatically dismissed once a sub-item is selected from the collapsed sidebar, resulting in a smoother navigation experience.

I will complete this within 1 hour after the issue is assigned.

Thank you!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11751
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan can you please assign me this issue 

Describe your solution clearly
To handle expired appointments efficiently, I will implement an automatic cancellation system. When a user opens the appointment dialog, the system will check if the current date and time have passed the scheduled appointment time. If the appointment is still active and not in a final state (like ‚ÄúCompleted‚Äù or ‚ÄúCancelled‚Äù), it should be cancelled automatically

approach :- 
I will use a useEffect hook to trigger a function that compares the current time with the appointment‚Äôs start_date_time.
if the current time is greater, the system will call the cancel Appointment 
Expected Timeline
End date: within 24 hours after I've been assigned
